content: finished measurements top calf diameter side to side - unstretched 3 9 4 2 4 5 4 7 10 10 75 11 5 12 cm finished length 16 9 43 cm for all sizes yarn used feeling good yarn by wool and the gang - 3 balls you will also need a tapestry needle for finishing this is a free pattern from the wool and the gang website you just need to join their site to receive the pattern it contains 4 sizes and has a schematic and video tutorials to help beginner knitters
